Banner.name: JIHYEON JEONG.
Banner.tagline: I build things for the web.
Banner.description: I am a web developer with 5+ years of experience in React. I have a strong foundation in front-end & back-end development and am skilled in creating user-friendly and responsive web applications using React and its ecosystem.

About.intro: Hello! My name is Jihyeon Jeong and I enjoy coding and creating values from them. Started my career since 2019 in web development when I decided to become a professional frontend developer. Since then, I have consistently pursued learning opportunities and applied my knowledge to create exceptional services.
About.experience: Fast-forward to today, and I had the privilege of working at startups, developing SaaS projects from scratch and maintaining them in the most time-efficient manner. One of the key factors from my experience is the careful selection of appropriate tech stacks for each project, ensuring optimal results.
About.learning: In addition to my practical experience, I am committed to enhancing my development skills through continuous learning. I frequently seek guidance from industry experts and stay up-to-date with the latest trends and techniques by watching YouTube videos and tutorials.
About.adaptability: I believe I can adopt any tech stacks in a timely manner to meet the requirements of any development organization. As a frontend developer, I am confident in my versatility and adaptability.
About.techListIntro: Here are a few technologies I have been working with recently:
